title: Working in a store
creator_credit: Basic Films, Sir Arthur Hallam Elton and Kay Mander
brief_description: The second film in the series “Is this the job for me?” shows what it is like to work in a stores as seen through the eyes of a young girl who has just left school. It gives an unvarnished account of the life of a salesgirl; points out the advantages and disadvantages of this type of work and describes the opportunities for advancement.
